headline: Microchip Technology Sees Demand Strengthen as Channel Normalizes, Shifts Focus to Debt Paydown
summary: Microchip Technology (NASDAQ:MCHP) executives said the company is seeing signs of strengthening demand and a more normalized channel environment, while reiterating that near-term financial priorities have shifted toward debt reduction following the recent downturn.
